text: I once heard two ladies going on and on about the pains of childbirth and how men don't seem to know what real pain is. I asked if either of them ever got themselves caught in a zipper.
author: Emo Philips

text: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
author: Anatole France

text: To judge from the notions expounded by theologians, one must conclude that God created most men simply with a view to crowding hell.
author: Marquis de Sade

text: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom.
author: Pythagoras

text: We must make it clear that a platform of 'I hate gay men and women' is not a way to become president of the United States.
author: Jimmy Carter
